name: subeq0d
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: mpbid(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0))
-| wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0), wceq(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0))
-| wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0), wceq(c0, c1)))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0), wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0), wceq(c0, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0), wceq(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0), wceq(c0, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0), wceq(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), nat0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))

comment: If the difference between two numbers is zero, they are equal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
